Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

Investment_Pool_Transfer_Data.description: Transaction Date is the day the units were transferred

validation.validation: Cannot perform investment pool transaction for the future. The Transaction Date must be on or before the current date.
The Investment Pool Transaction Date cannot be set prior to the latest recorded Investment Pool Valuation Fiscal Period End Date [latest fiscal period end date for investment pool from gift].

Investment_Pool_Transfer_Data.description: Reference to existing worktags. Worktags are a way to mark tasks and business objects to make them easier to access and summarize. Each transaction can include one value for each worktag type and is subject to configurable validation when submitted for approval.

validation.validation: Remove these worktag types that aren't valid for this transaction: [list of worktag types].
Only one worktag of each type is allowed

[partitionable] is not allowed to be used by [gift company].
[worktag value] is not permitted as an allowed value for worktag type: [worktag type], because it is inactive.
[invalid worktag value message]

validation.validation: Donor Contribution ID is required for Purchase Transaction line for Manual Unit selection method.
Line Amount  is required for Manual Unit selection method.
Number of Units to sell should be equal to the total of Transaction Line Units.
Line Amount specified should be less than or equal to remaining amount on Transaction Line.
Transaction line ID is required for Manual Unit selection method.
Line Units is required for Manual  Unit selection method.
Line Amount is only required for Manual Unit selection method.
Source Transaction Line is only required for Manual Unit selection method.
Donor Contribution ID is only required for Manual Unit selection method.
Line Units are only required for Manual Unit selection method.
Line Units should be less than equal to available units on Transaction Line.

Investment_Pool_Transfer_Line_Data.description: The type of transaction used as a unit source
The date the unit source transaction took place
The unit price used to acquire the units and determine book value
The number of units transferred from this unit source
The book value transferred from this unit source
The book value that was later withdrawn from this transfer

description: Investment Pool Transfer Data contains essential information about an Investment Pool Transfer

validation.validation: The source and destination Gift may not be the same.
The source and destination Gift must belong to the same Investment Pool.

Edit the investment pool to configure Revenue Categories for Net Asset Accounting.
